# Integrated Filter Methods

The following table shows the available methods for calculating the feature importance.
Columns **Classif**, **Regr** and **Surv** indicate if classification, regression or survival
analysis problems are supported.
Columns **Fac.** and **Num.** show if a particular method can deal with factor and
numeric features.

```{r, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
linkPkg = function(x) {
  ifelse(is.na(x), "", collapse(sprintf("[%1$s](http://www.rdocumentation.org/packages/%1$s/)", x), sep = "<br />"))
}
df = listFilterMethods(desc = TRUE, tasks = TRUE, features = TRUE)
df$package = sapply(df$package, linkPkg)

logicals = vlapply(df, is.logical)
df[logicals] = lapply(df[logicals], function(x) ifelse(x, "X", ""))
names(df) = c("ID", "Package", "Description", "Classif", "Regr", "Surv", "Fac.", "Num.")
just = rep(c("left", "center"), c(3, 5))
pandoc.table(df, style = "rmarkdown", split.tables = Inf, split.cells = Inf, justify = just)
```
